q1: I really love the team Chelsea
a1: I do not like Chelsea, but lots of people do.
q2: They're not going to win the EPL this year.
a2: It's a good team, I think if they can win
q3: What are their chances to win the premier league?
a3: I do not see Chelsea winning the EPL. Liverpool will win it this year.
a4: Liverpool is a much better team.
a5: Alvaro Morato is the top striker at Chelsea.
